settings.title: CULTIVATED
settings.subtitle: the best materials brought together in a dapper collection

settings.title: SLIDE ACTION
settings.subtitle: M1 RAIL WALLET with rapid card access

settings.title: TAKE ACTION
settings.subtitle: SPEC-OPS EDITION - durable cerakote finish packed with action

settings.content: DTEX Material is our newly developed material that is non-leather but very durable. The textured surface is easy to clean and water resistant. The feel is incredibly tactile and molds to your everyday use.

settings.title: MODIFY to your touch
settings.content: Compatible with: D01, T01, D02, T02 & D007

settings.title: M007 Limited Edition Wallet
settings.content:
Unleashed from the quartermaster’s chamber, the M007 Limited Edition wallet awaits its mission. Designed to meld elegance & function with a tactical edge, this wallet will bring out the Bond in anyone that uses it. The M007 wallet is equipped with the MT04 multi-tool, a must-have for any special agent’s pocket arsenal, boasting over 10 functions. 

Machined out of 6061 aerospace aluminum, the chem-etched gold anodized wallet chassis has a velvet-like finish. The hand polished nickel plated backplate creates a contrast between ultra-matte and high-gloss. The combination of top grain leather, premium metals & precision craftsmanship really defines the design language of the M007 Limited Edition Wallet.

settings.title: SHAKEN
settings.text: A hybrid of tactical functions, uncanny style and fashion puts the M007 wallet in a space all on it's own, shaking up the slim wallet sector.

settings.content: The P02 Pioneer Travel Wallet packs all the necessities for the avid world traveller. With a sidekick like the P02, you'll always be prepared in any part of the world.

settings.title: anchor points
settings.text: Dual anchor points for tethering and strap connection. The anchors can be exposed for use or tucked away when not in use.

settings.title: Pen slot
settings.text: Access your pen from the exterior of the wallet or from the interior. You'll always be prepared with something to write with in times of need.

settings.title: Multiple Pockets
settings.text: Versatile and customizable pocket layouts. Fit up to 10 cards, cash, coins, SD cards, keys, two passports, notebooks, pens, and whatever you may need on your next journey.

settings.title: Dango Strap
settings.text: Included with every P02 purchase is a durable strap with metal clasps. The clasps are made of steel and has a lever for easy disengagement.

settings.title: DTEX
settings.text: The water resistant DTEX material is scratch resistant as well and gives the wallet a rugged yet sleek feel. It's easy to clean and looks stunning.

settings.title: Coin capsule
settings.content: American coins bare a unique design and size that is familiar to all who use them. The Dango Coin Capsule encapsulates these icons of currency in an organized and neat manner for daily use. Rid yourself of the loose change and keep them organized and ready to deploy. Wether you are on a vending excursion or transporting collectible coins, these capsules pack a hefty load.

settings.title: COIN CARRY
settings.text:
CNC MACHINED ANODIZED ALUMINUM

HOLDS: 16 QUARTERS, 10 DIMES, 7 NICKLES, AND 9 PENNIES

BUILT-IN BELT CLIP AND TETHER ANCHOR

MADE IN USA

settings.content: The D01 Dapper Pen Wallet is packed with functionality necessary to record and reflect on a moment's notice. Equipped with an anodized aluminum pen & notebook, this wallet encompasses the EDC ethos. Built to hold a whole lot while keeping slim and neat.

settings.title: scribe Right
settings.text: Never be without a pen. You can draw, write & scribble all the bits you need to spark your next endeavor. The 48 page notebook coupled with the Dango Pen is dapperly encased within the D01 form factor making it one of the most iconic wallet pens designed & built in USA.

settings.title: Slide
settings.text: Load and unload cards with a simple slide action. Identify yourself with a protective card case that radiates sleekness and functionality.

settings.title: M1 MAVERICK TITANIUM WALLET
settings.content: Cutting edge manufacturing techniques, premium materials & contemporary industrial design are key ingredients to the Dango culture. The M1 Titanium wallet embodies this vision and manifests itself in an everyday, functional carry.Â

settings.title: TACTICAL
settings.text: The M1 Titanium wallet comes equipped with the MT04 Multi-Tool. Available in both bifold and single pocket versions.Â

settings.content: The D007 GOLDFINGER Limited Edition Pen Wallet primes you for the next mission. Always be equipped with the best from Dango.

settings.title: The Gold Standard
settings.text: High polished gold anodized aluminum wallet frame, back plate & pen, genuine black leather, mil-spec bolts, durable silicone wallet band and a 48 page dot gridded notebook.

settings.title: MIGHTIER
settings.text: High polished gold anodized aluminum cap and barrel. Space ink included with zero gravity pressurized ink.

settings.title: A10 ADAPT WALLETS
settings.content: This wallet is truly one-of-a-kind with the Dango rail system that allows you to quickly interchange between pocket adapters, accessories, and cards. The rail system also doubles as an open ID window for displaying identification, badges, and any cards that need scanning. As with all of our wallets, the A10 is Made in USA with top quality materials.

settings.title: P01 PIONEER TRAVEL WALLET
settings.content: The P01 Pioneer Travel Wallet continues to traverse the landscape with its ability to carry and secure a wide range of everyday essentials. Equipped with a pen pocket, zipper pouch, D-ring attachment point, MT01 multi-tool clasp, DTEX material cash strap, multiple card pockets & an open ID pocket window, the P01 packs a bunch including the ability to secure a passport.

settings.title: Journey
settings.text: Wherever you are on the planet, the P01 Pioneer Travel Wallet packs it in and keeps you prepared and ready. DTEX material keeps your content protected and accessible. Fine tune your EDC and keep exploring the many ways to carry.
